function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in correlating SARS-CoV-2 RNA in wastewater with COVID-19 prevalence due to various factors such as excretion differences, environmental variables, and unreported cases.","Impact":"Lack of accurate data interpretation leading to ineffective risk management and decision-making.","Mitigation":"Developing quantitative models to correct for variables affecting wastewater surveillance data and exploring complex models to understand the correlation.","Technologies":"Quantitative modeling, statistical analysis, and computational tools for data interpretation.","People":"Public health officials, researchers, and decision-makers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, and data analysis experts"}]}
